message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for us to work together. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. I can do $8500, which is a compromise between our previous offers. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $8000?
